sourcing.instructions: - Lanthanum: Purchase from a chemical supply company or online specialty metals distributor.
steps: - Lanthanum: Purchase from a chemical supply company or online specialty metals distributor.
1. Weigh out 42.44 g of Lanthanum, 84.68 g of Selenium, and 31.00 g of Yttrium using an analytical balance.
preparation.raw_text: 1. Weigh out 42.44 g of Lanthanum, 84.68 g of Selenium, and 31.00 g of Yttrium using an analytical balance.

steps: 1. After the heating duration, turn off the furnace and allow it to cool to room temperature naturally.
cooling.raw_text: 1. After the heating duration, turn off the furnace and allow it to cool to room temperature naturally.

steps: 1. Once cooled, carefully remove the crucible and extract the solid sample using appropriate safety equipment.
post_processing.raw_text: 1. Once cooled, carefully remove the crucible and extract the solid sample using appropriate safety equipment.
